page.title: 06Lunch Time
page.content: At 12 o clock we have our school lunch time. We line up at the classroom door and go through the Infants class. We go through the corridor and into the toilets. We wash our hands and dry them with a paper towel. Then we get our lunchboxes. When we are all in the dining room we stand behind our chairs and say our prayers, which is saying Thank you to God. Then we sit down. Our table has 4 people on it. There is a lot of noise usually because we all talk to each other, (or rather shout at each other). My mum is a dinnerlady and she looks after us at lunchtime. For my lunch I sometimes have ham in my sandwiches. I have orange juice, a chocolate covered biscuit, crisps and a yoghurt as well.
